participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: friendly and supportive, enjoys engaging in sports activities with kids.
participant_1.background: i drive a mini van. coffee is my preferred beverage. i coach little league baseball. i also like a glass of wine in the evenings. i've five sons.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: ambitious and caring, loves sports and values family time.
participant_2.background: i am a doctor. i'm now looking for a new job. my favorite movie is friday. i enjoy going to the park.

content.text: that is cool , i am a pro football player , and i love baseball , you ?
